history.proof: intros. induction H. - reflexivity. - f_equal. shelve.

A: Type
============================
forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2 -> length l1 = length l2

Inductive btree (A : Type) : Type := leaf : A -> btree A | node : btree A -> btree A -> btree A Arguments btree _%type_scope Arguments leaf [A]%type_scope Arguments node [A]%type_scope
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive subst_pred : list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> btree A -> Prop := subst_pred_id : forall t1 t2 : btree A, list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> subst_pred (t1 :: nil) (t2 :: nil) t1 t2 | subst_pred_node : forall (t1 t2 t3 t4 : btree A) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2 -> subst_pred l3 l4 t3 t4 -> subst_pred (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4) (node t1 t3) (node t2 t4) Arguments subst_pred (_ _)%list_scope Arguments subst_pred_id _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments subst_pred_node _ _ _ _ (_ _ _ _ _ _)%list_scope
subst_pred_ordered_cover_l : forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2 -> ordered_cover l1 t1
subst_pred_ordered_cover_r : forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2 -> ordered_cover l2 t2
subst_pred_node : forall (t1 t2 t3 t4 : btree A) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2 -> subst_pred l3 l4 t3 t4 -> subst_pred (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4) (node t1 t3) (node t2 t4)
ordered_cover_node : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> ordered_cover l1 t1 -> ordered_cover l2 t2 -> ordered_cover (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)
cover_app : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), cover l1 t1 -> cover l2 t2 -> cover (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)
subst_pred_ind : forall P : list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> btree A -> Prop, (forall t1 t2 : btree A, list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> P (t1 :: nil) (t2 :: nil) t1 t2) -> (forall (t1 t2 t3 t4 : btree A) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2 -> P l1 l2 t1 t2 -> subst_pred l3 l4 t3 t4 -> P l3 l4 t3 t4 -> P (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4) (node t1 t3) (node t2 t4)) -> forall (l l0 : list (btree A)) (b b0 : btree A), subst_pred l l0 b b0 -> P l l0 b b0
subst_pred_sind : forall P : list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> btree A -> SProp, (forall t1 t2 : btree A, list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> P (t1 :: nil) (t2 :: nil) t1 t2) -> (forall (t1 t2 t3 t4 : btree A) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2 -> P l1 l2 t1 t2 -> subst_pred l3 l4 t3 t4 -> P l3 l4 t3 t4 -> P (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4) (node t1 t3) (node t2 t4)) -> forall (l l0 : list (btree A)) (b b0 : btree A), subst_pred l l0 b b0 -> P l l0 b b0
ordered_cover_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop), (forall t : btree A, list (btree A) -> P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> ordered_cover l1 t1 -> P l1 t1 -> ordered_cover l2 t2 -> P l2 t2 -> P (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), ordered_cover l b -> P l b
ordered_cover_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp), (forall t : btree A, list (btree A) -> P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> ordered_cover l1 t1 -> P l1 t1 -> ordered_cover l2 t2 -> P l2 t2 -> P (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), ordered_cover l b -> P l b
cover_inv_app : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l (node t1 t2) -> l = node t1 t2 :: nil \/ (exists l1 l2 : list (btree A), (cover l1 t1 /\ cover l2 t2) /\ permutation l (l1 ++ l2))
cover_node : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> cover l1 t3
subst_pred_id : forall t1 t2 : btree A, list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> subst_pred (t1 :: nil) (t2 :: nil) t1 t2
cover_inv_app_aux : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l t -> t = node t1 t2 -> l = node t1 t2 :: nil \/ (exists l1 l2 : list (btree A), (cover l1 t1 /\ cover l2 t2) /\ permutation l (l1 ++ l2))
height_pred_node : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> height_pred (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> height_pred n (ln1 ++ ln2) (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)
cover_cons_l : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 : list (btree A)), cover l1 t1 -> cover (t2 :: l1) (node t2 t1)
cover_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop), (forall t : btree A, P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b
cover_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp), (forall t : btree A, P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b
Inductive ordered_cover (A : Type) : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := ordered_cover_one : forall t : btree A, list (btree A) -> ordered_cover (t :: nil) t | ordered_cover_node : forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> ordered_cover l1 t1 -> ordered_cover l2 t2 -> ordered_cover (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2) Arguments ordered_cover [A]%type_scope _%list_scope Arguments ordered_cover_one _%type_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments ordered_cover_node _%type_scope _ _ (_ _ _)%list_scope
Inductive cover (A : Type) : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := cover_one : forall t : btree A, cover (t :: nil) t | cover_node : forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> cover l1 t3 Arguments cover [A]%type_scope _%list_scope Arguments cover_one _%type_scope Arguments cover_node _%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope
height_pred_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : nat -> list nat -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop), (forall (n : nat) (t : btree A), P n (n :: nil) (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (n : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> P (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> height_pred (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P n (ln1 ++ ln2) (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (n : nat) (l : list nat) (l0 : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), height_pred n l l0 b -> P n l l0 b
height_pred_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : nat -> list nat -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp), (forall (n : nat) (t : btree A), P n (n :: nil) (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (n : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> P (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> height_pred (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P n (ln1 ++ ln2) (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (n : nat) (l : list nat) (l0 : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), height_pred n l l0 b -> P n l l0 b
height_pred_shrink : forall (A : Type) (n a b : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred n (ln1 ++ a :: b :: ln2) (l1 ++ t1 :: t2 :: l2) t -> (forall n1 : nat, In n1 ln1 -> n1 < a) -> (forall n1 : nat, In n1 (b :: ln2) -> n1 <= a) -> length ln1 = length l1 -> height_pred n (ln1 ++ Init.Nat.pred a :: ln2) (l1 ++ node t1 t2 :: l2) t
weight_tree_list_node : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), weight_tree_list f (node t1 t2 :: l) = sum_leaves f t1 + sum_leaves f t2 + weight_tree_list f (t1 :: t2 :: l)
cover_in_inb : forall (A : Type) (l : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 : btree A), cover l t1 -> In t2 l -> inb t2 t1
prod2list_app : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l1 : list nat) (l2 : list (btree A)) (l3 : list nat) (l4 : list (btree A)), length l1 = length l2 -> prod2list f (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4) = prod2list f l1 l2 + prod2list f l3 l4
cover_in_inb_inb : forall (A : Type) (l : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), cover l t1 -> In t2 l -> inb t3 t2 -> inb t3 t1
cover_permutation : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), cover l1 t -> permutation l1 l2 -> cover l2 t
Inductive height_pred (A : Type) : nat -> list nat -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := height_pred_nil : forall (n : nat) (t : btree A), height_pred n (n :: nil) (t :: nil) t | height_pred_node : forall (n : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> height_pred (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> height_pred n (ln1 ++ ln2) (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2) Arguments height_pred [A]%type_scope _%nat_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments height_pred_nil _%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments height_pred_node _%type_scope _%nat_scope (_ _)%list_scope _ _ (_ _)%list_scope
length_app : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), length (l1 ++ l2) = length l1 + length l2
prod2list_eq : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (a : nat) (b c : btree A) (l1 l2 l3 : list nat) (l4 l5 l6 : list (btree A)), length l1 = length l4 -> length l2 = length l5 -> length l3 = length l6 -> prod2list f (l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ a :: l3) (l4 ++ b :: l5 ++ c :: l6) = prod2list f (l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ a :: l3) (l4 ++ c :: l5 ++ b :: l6)
